page.title: 05KETTERING NEWBOROUGH CENTRE
page.content: The centre first opened in 1978.In the morning the doors are opened at 6.30am. for cleaners and at 8.00am. for the general public.The doors close at 7.00pm. on Monday,Tuesday and Saturday but on Wednesday,Thursday and Friday the centre closes at 9.00pm.The three Thursdays before Christmas the shops close at 9.00pm.During Christmas time the centre is decorated and choirs sing and bands play to entertain the shoppers.During Christmas 1984 the shop assistants were in fancy dress.Father Christmas gives sweets to the children. The centre manager employs 5 caretakers ,3 part time cleaners 4 toilet attendant and 3 security guards.In the centre there are 29 shop units.There is also the British Legion Club and 3 office suites.All of the premises are leased.
